com.bumptech.glide.presenter.target
Interface Target

All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseTarget, ImageViewTarget, SimpleTarget, ViewTarget
public interface Target

An interface that Glide can load an image into

Nested Class Summary
static interface Target.SizeReadyCallback
          A callback that must be called when the target has determined its size.

          A method that can optionally be implemented to set any placeholder that might have been passed to Glide to display either while an image is loading or after the load has failed.
